title: [Large-Scale] Mobile-Based Gamified Learning Course for Mathematical Terminology

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical concepts and proficiency in everyday language use at a native level
context.additional_context: A course designed for immigrant practitioners to acquire workplace mathematics terminology, offering a blended learning environment combining mobile apps and offline practice.

learning_goals: Learners can translate 100 essential math terms with 80%+ accuracy using a gamified MALL app
Learners successfully resolve workplace math problem scenarios three or more times through in-app simulation tasks

Learners collaborate with three peer learners during three weekly recap sessions to co-create a math concept map covering ten core concepts in [geometry/algebra/statistics], and achieve "excellent" ratings in two or more of three peer evaluation rubric items (clarity, connectivity, creativity).
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
